title: Doctor Shares His Experience of Sri Narasimha Jayanti and Spiritual Journey with ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.key_quote: The whole environment was so powerful and for a for my profession where I only hear about disease and pain and suffering I for a while was feeling completely out of any miserable situation and pain.
segments.summary: A doctor shares his positive experience of attending Sri Narasimha Jayanti at ISKCON Bangalore, highlighting the powerful and uplifting environment that provided respite from the suffering he witnesses in his profession, and expressing gratitude for ISKCON's positive influence on his life over the past 20 years.
